PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-13722018-11-06,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the firm of accountants Price Waterhouse Coopers as Auditor of the Canada Eldor Inc, wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the Canada Eldor Inc., wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Eldor Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Appointment of the firm of accountants Price Waterhouse Coopers as Auditor of the Canada Eldor Inc, wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation
precis: Order Appointing (1) PRICE WATERHOUSE COOPERS of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the Canada Eldor Inc., wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Eldor Inc., a wholly-owned subsidiary of the Canada Development Investment Corporation, for a period of one year effective November 1, 2018.
